events.message: I would like to request a refund for the shoes I purchased last week because they don't fit as expected and I want to return them for my money back.
The case has been categorized as a Refund request based on the customer's desire to return purchased shoes due to sizing issues.
Assigning this refund request to the returns team to assist the customer with the return process and refund issuance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to assist you with the refund and return process for your shoes.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the shoes? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 123456789. The shoes are unworn and in their original packaging, ready to be returned promptly.
Thank you for the details. Please use the prepaid shipping label we emailed to you to send the shoes back. The refund will be credited within 5 business days after we receive the return.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the shoes back today using the label provided.
We have received the returned shoes and processed your refund. The money should appear on your payment method shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and please reach out if you have any other questions in the future.
